# hv_vm_config_set_el2_enabled(_:_:)

**Function**

Sets whether the specified VM configuration enables support for Exception Level 2 (EL2).

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vm_config_set_el2_enabled(_ config: hv_vm_config_t, _ el2_enabled: Bool) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **config**: The VMâ€™s configuration object
- **el2_enabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the specified configure enables EL2. The framework writes this value on success; otherwise `nil`.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/HV_SUCCESS] if the operation was successful, otherwise an error code specified in [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t].

## Nested virtualization

- **hv_vm_config_get_el2_supported(_:)**: Returns a status value that indicates whether the current platform supports Exception Level 2 (EL2).
- **hv_vm_config_get_el2_enabled(_:_:)**: Return a status value that indicates whether the VM configuration enables support for Exception Level 2 (EL2).
